118549.text: Revert kubelet prober metrics `pod` tag to include actual pod name
118549.markdown: Revert kubelet prober metrics `pod` tag to include actual pod name ([#118549](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/118549), [@a7i](https://github.com/a7i)) [SIG Node]
118549.author: a7i

118895.text: Added IP mode field to loadbalancer status ingress.
118895.markdown: Added IP mode field to loadbalancer status ingress. ([#118895](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/118895), [@RyanAoh](https://github.com/RyanAoh))
118895.author: RyanAoh

119128.text: Fixed issue https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/cloud-provider-azure/issues/4230 and removed the additional filtering on `NotReady` nodes by the Azure cloud provider code
119128.markdown: Fixed issue https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/cloud-provider-azure/issues/4230 and removed the additional filtering on `NotReady` nodes by the Azure cloud provider code ([#119128](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119128), [@alexanderConstantinescu](https://github.com/alexanderConstantinescu)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
119128.author: alexanderConstantinescu

119653.markdown: Fixed CustomResourceDefinition `status.storedVersions` validation error messages. ([#119653](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119653), [@sttts](https://github.com/sttts)) [SIG API Machinery]
119653.author: sttts

119729.text: `kube-scheduler`: Fine-grained tracking of events (introduced in 1.28) suffered from a data race when binding fails.
119729.markdown: `kube-scheduler`: Fine-grained tracking of events (introduced in 1.28) suffered from a data race when binding fails. ([#119729](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119729), [@pohly](https://github.com/pohly)) [SIG Scheduling]
119729.author: pohly

119784.text: When the cluster size is small and the scheduler doesn't get unscheduled Pods frequently, the scheduler doesn't try to reschedule Pods in some cases.
119784.markdown: When the cluster size is small and the scheduler doesn't get unscheduled Pods frequently, the scheduler doesn't try to reschedule Pods in some cases. ([#119784](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119784), [@sanposhiho](https://github.com/sanposhiho)) [SIG Scheduling and Testing]
119784.author: sanposhiho

119804.text: Kubernetes is now built with Go `1.20.7`
119804.markdown: Kubernetes is now built with Go `1.20.7` ([#119804](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119804), [@jeremyrickard](https://github.com/jeremyrickard)) [SIG Release and Testing]
119804.author: jeremyrickard

119818.markdown: Bumped `distroless-iptables` to `0.2.7` based on Go 1.20.7 ([#119818](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119818), [@jeremyrickard](https://github.com/jeremyrickard)) [SIG Testing]
119818.author: jeremyrickard

119835.text: Aggregated discovery now returns `responseKind: {}` for resources which are missing group/version/kind information, to ensure compatibility with `v0.26.0`-`v0.26.3` clients.
119835.markdown: Aggregated discovery now returns `responseKind: {}` for resources which are missing group/version/kind information, to ensure compatibility with `v0.26.0`-`v0.26.3` clients. ([#119835](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119835), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]
119835.author: liggitt

119867.text: kube-proxy in Kubernetes v1.28 up until `v1.28.0-beta.0` ignored the `-v` command line flag when combined with `--config`.
119867.markdown: kube-proxy in Kubernetes v1.28 up until `v1.28.0-beta.0` ignored the `-v` command line flag when combined with `--config`. ([#119867](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119867), [@pohly](https://github.com/pohly)) [SIG Network]
119867.author: pohly

119888.text: k8s.io/apiserver: Fixed a nil panic attempting to collect etcd metrics in aggregated API servers that don't initialize etcd storage
119888.markdown: K8s.io/apiserver: Fixed a nil panic attempting to collect etcd metrics in aggregated API servers that don't initialize etcd storage ([#119888](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119888), [@dgrisonnet](https://github.com/dgrisonnet)) [SIG API Machinery]
119888.author: dgrisonnet
